title: What is the best museum in the United Kingdom? - Quora

response.answer_text: United Kingdom is home to over thousands of museums including national museums, university museums, independent museums and so on. Most of these museums offer free admission. The following are the best museums in the United Kingdom. Best museums in the United Kingdom: The British Museum is the best and popular tourist attraction in the United Kingdom. It was founded in 1753 and is located at Great Russell Street, Bloomsbury, London, England. It offers free entry and is open for visitors from all around the world. It is also the first museum dedicated to all fields of human knowledge. Visit and discover two million years of human history, art and culture. National Museum of Scotland is one of the best museums to visit in Scotland and is it also offer free admission. It is located at Chambers Street, Edinburgh, Scotland. This museum building was formed in 1998 and was renovated and opened in 2011. Visit and discover the grand gallery, Scottish history, wonders of nature and lot more. National Museum Cardiff is one of the best museum and art galleries to visit in Wales. It an amazing place to explore the early life in Wales, world-class art, natural history collections, magnificent paintings etc. It is located at Cathays Park, Cardiff, Wales and offer free entry. Titanic Belfast is one of the best tourist attractions to explore in Northern Ireland. It was opened in 2012 and is located at 1 Olympic Way, Queen's Road, Belfast, Northern Ireland. Visit and discover about world's most famous ship - RMS Titanic. Plan a visit to these museums and explore their amazing collections.

The Lapworth Museum at the University of Birmingham. Fossils & Minerals. A small museum but one which helps you understand more about the subject whatever your age - my grandchildren aged 3 and 14 think it’s utterly wow and the three year old cried last time we had to leave. And the staff are very friendly, very well informed, and totally approachable. And like many UK museums - free to enter. Of course ‘best’ is always linked to ones that you can access. Others will find ‘best’ venues close to their homes.
